import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import { Home, Person, Code, ContactMail, FolderOpen } from '@material-ui/icons'; const Navigation = (props) => { const [isSticky, setSticky] = useState(true) const domRef = useRef(); useEffect(()=> { const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => { entries.forEach(entry => { console.log(entry) }) }) observer.observe(domRef.current); return () => observer.unobserve(domRef.current); }, []); return (
Home About Skills Projects Contact
) } export default Navigation
